A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There isn't much I can add that hasn't been said here already.  I just find it awfully suspect that the professional critics gave this terrible movie 91%.  I guess in this day and age of fake news\, we can include fake reviews.\n\nBTW\, this movie was a real clunker.  I really didn't care for any of it.  Poorly fleshed characters\, bad jokes and lack of continuity made this a really long and disappointing movie.
